title: LIVE IM 25h with Tschief, Tilmann Schanze & YVY MARAEY
description:
At „LIVE IM 25h“, the pop culture event series at the 25hours Hotel in Bikini Berlin, young artists from a wide range of disciplines meet each month.

Tschief
Sebastian Becker has been publishing short poetic and handwritten texts online under the pseudonym TSCHIEF since 2013. His handwriting has become his trademark and has set him apart from many other writers on the internet from the very beginning. More than 100,000 people now follow his writing and thoughts on Instagram.

Tilmann Schanze
The Berlin writer Tilmann Schanze (25) writes poems about everything that moves him and hits the nerve of his generation with his own style. One of his texts was aptly described as "a bit like salt in the wound. But somehow I'm into it", and that fits. At least he thinks so.


YVY MARAEY
Although Yvy Marãey grew up in Berlin as the daughter of a German mother, she never let go of her father's Brazilian culture. Together with the New Zealand guitarist and producer Simon Abela, she pursued this interest and began to combine Brazilian rhythms with contemporary R&B. Crystal clear and soulful vocals in English and Portuguese are combined with playful melodies and relaxed beats. Yvy Marãey presents herself in a light and informal manner with a mixture of European and Latin American sounds that find common roots in catchy grooves.

title: d.OHA!se / thursday techno
description:

title: MissVergnügen presents KAJBO - live
description:
Kajbo?

Ja, Kajbo.


Kajbo heißt auf Schwedisch Dohlennest. Sehr gemütlich? Auf japanisch bedeutet Kajbo „Autopsie", gemütliche Autopsie? Was bedeutet Kajbo auf Estnisch?

Rainer Jancis:

(...) you have to try some other language or make up meaning yourself.

 All words are just bubbles , they become something only after we make agreement what they mean. ... words are rockstars"


Kajbo ist ein neues Wort.


Kajbo heißt Satire trifft progressive Popmusik, harte Beats, zarte Synthies, geniale Texte, die den Zeitgeist treffen.

Sind wir normal? Sind wir legal? Ist die Revolution digital? Bist du gut strukturiert? Macht jemand Kaffee nur für dich?

Die Antwort kennst nur du.


Kajbo ist eine fiktive Person, präsentiert von Boky als Kajbo und Schmacky als seinem Host.

Ganz nach dem Motto:

„Kommt tanzen, kommt staunen!"


Kajbo

Neue Lieder! Neue Show!

Djne:MissVergnügen

ab 21uhr
Live show 22uhr

title: Anechoic X Groove Street
description:
Anechoic X Groove Street

On May 24th, we'll take our audience on a musical journey, starting at 128 BPM and gradually rising to 140-150 BPM. Let's embark on an amazing voyage through house music, heavy bassline beats, funky tunes, bouncy rhythms, UK garage, techno, and trance with uplifting beats. Follow the music and bring your own incredible experience to this spring event with your happy feet.
This marks the first collaboration between Anechoic and Groove Street. It promises to be a fantastic experience as two different music genres come together to organize a musical journey for our audience.

title: APERIGiri - SEASON OPENING
description:
Join us every Thursday evening from 6pm to midnight for the second season of ultimate weekly apéritif experience: APERIGIRI. 

This week, our resident DJs will be taking over the decks, curating the perfect soundtrack to accompany your evening of community and relaxation. Meanwhile, the GIRI team will be hard at work preparing a delicious array of bites and drinks to tantalize your taste buds.

Whether you're looking to unwind after a long day or kickstart your weekend early, APERIGIRI is the place to be. Join us as we celebrate the beginning of summer with music, drinks, and good vibes all around!

Baci

description:
Hope you missed us the way we miss high school house parties, as we're celebrating our first b-day by throwing a Haus Party in a magnificent Altbau in Mitte

title: BDME Opening Drinks - Free Entry
description: The Berlin Dance Music Event invites you to our Kick Off Gathering! Join us for a relaxed event to ease into the Berlin Dance Music Event 2024 with casual networking and smooth beats. It’s the perfect way to start your festival experience, meet fellow music enthusiasts, and get into the groove of the event. Don’t miss this chance to connect and celebrate the beginning of a memorable weekend in the heart of Berlin’s vibrant music scene!

title: ABOR x Småland
description:
Step into the beat-saturated realm of Berlin's ABOR Collective and Hamburg's well-known event series SMÅLAND for a night that's not just a party—it's a vibe. 

Expect a meticulously curated fusion of pulsating house and minimal music, where the O-floor throbs with deep, driving minimal beats, courtesy of ABOR, while the X-floor ignites with the infectious rhythms of shaking and pumping house sound, handpicked by the Småland crew. 

And guess what? This sonic extravaganza syncs perfectly with the pulse-pounding energy of the Berlin Dance Music Event 2024, making it a must-hit for all you electronic music aficionados out there.

title: Späti Rave
description:
Join us for a Späti Rave! 

Registration via Luma is a MUST (Link below) 

øhr collective, together with BlockRavers is throwing a Späti Rave, and you don't wanna miss it! Prepare to be mesmerized by an electrifying lineup of Berlin’s finest and international DJs, accompanied by an Audio-Visual performance by Nikita FREEBOID, set to transform your night into an unforgettable journey of sound. Immerse yourself in a vibrant atmosphere, where the beats resonate with the pulse of the city, and every sip of your drink syncs with the music’s flow.

As a highlight of Blockchain Week Berlin 2024, this event is a collaboration of innovation and beats, brought to you by the pioneers at Crypto Girls Club and their partners. 

Don’t just attend an event; be part of a movement with øhr as we dance toward a new era in the electronic music industry. øhr’s mission is to transform the electronic music landscape for DJs and underground producers by enhancing their earnings beyond live gigs through innovative monetization channels, the gain of precise insights into the distribution and performance of their music, and cultivating richer relationships with fans and collaborators.

Dress Code: Come as you are, leave as a legend
Be there or be square – because this is where the blockchain beats!

title: INFECTED DNB with NATHAN X
description:
FRI, 24.05.2024 | INFECTED w/ NATHAN X (UK)
Drum & Bass at VOID Hall, Berlin

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬● Tickets ●▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

Presale: 11 € - Abendkasse/Box-office: 13 €

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬● Info ●▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

Drum & Bass music is an integral part of the electronic music scene, and it has been gaining popularity over the years. Drum & Bass events are a great way to experience the unique and powerful energy of this genre.
The atmosphere at these events is unlike any other. The basslines thump through the air, creating a heavy, yet exciting atmosphere. Everybody is dancing enthusiastically, and it’s easy to get lost in the moment. The energy of the crowd is palpable, and it’s infectious.
The lineup at Infected Drum & Bass events is carefully curated to create a unique and memorable experience. DJs spin the hottest tracks of the moment, often mixing in some timeless classic tunes.
A Drum & Bass event is a great place to meet like-minded people and make long-lasting friendships. Everyone is there to enjoy the music and have a good time, and it’s easy to make connections with fellow music lovers.
If you’re looking for an unforgettable night out, a Drum & Bass event is the perfect option. The music, atmosphere, and people make for a party that you won’t soon forget. So come join in the fun and make some amazing memories.

18+ Event - Doors: 23:00 h

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬● Location ●▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

VOID Hall - Wiesenweg 5-9 | 10365 Berlin
S-Ostkreuz | S+U Frankfurter Allee | S-Nöldner Platz

title: Circuit Structure X Mutate X Warehouse Manifesto
description:
Circuit Structure // MUTATE // Warehouse Manifesto

Bringing our combined vision of techno to a unique space in East Berlin.
A selection of techno to symbolise rhythm, passage or dance with focus to transmit our vision through hypnotic elements, fast paced groove and futurism.

M01, a new sister venue to Renate and ELSE. M01 will channel diverse sounds, On arrival,
punters will enter the club from the north side of Renate's building on Markgrafendamm before
passing through a secret garden complete with fairy lights and shipping containers, in classic
ELSE and Renate style.

Zero tolerance for violence, homophobia, transphobia, sexism, racism, or abuse. A Safe dancing space is at the core of our vision.

Circuit Structure // MUTATE // Warehouse Manifesto

title: Sportclub Bar Session vol.2
description: The bar session returns to celebrate spring in the city.

title: Tausend ELECTRONICA - Ceci Fierce
description:
Ceci Fierce emerges as a rising star among Berlin-based DJs and Producers, celebrated for her inventive and vibrant House music fusions.Her musical odyssey commenced at the age of five, mastering the violin and self-teaching piano. As time unfolded, she ventured into composing classical pieces and exploring the art of DJing during her college years, setting the stage for her distinctive sound today.
Ceci's performances transcend mere music; they become immersive voyages. She effortlessly connects with her audience, guiding them through a sonic labyrinth of unexpected twists and turns, fueled by her infectious positivity. Renowned for her versatility, her sets evolve from Organic and Afro House to Melodic, Tech, and Progressive House as the night unfolds, showcasing her dynamic prowess behind the decks.
While her narrative continues to unfold, one truth remains constant: when Ceci Fierce takes the stage, ears perk up and hearts beat to her rhythm.

title: BDME Grand Opening // free entry all night long
cutre
description:
hiii cut(r)e bbs, feel very invited to our cutre queer&soli performative party from ur local cut(r)ies to all u cut(r)ies & allies. 

this time we gonna shake it up-down-in-out-etccc (and beyondss (or not!)) with something we call deconstructed perrrreo (?), like we might go some little bit experimental (!)

we wanna invite u to collectively imagine different worlds u like to live in after consciously destroying the ones u know (u know?)

especially dedicated to dissident and racialized beings from the global south & allies

dj-sets & performances will join us in this night journey

*****

behind all this we are working on a social project localized in Esmeraldas (Ecuador). we have a rural house that we're starting to use as a relief center for girls that have suffered sexual abuse. our contribution from the other side of the world, aware of our privileges, would be running this kind of events and give them 60% of the profit. with the other part, we aim to continue organizing more and create a sustainable solidarity economy.

title: Garage Girls 2nd Bday Bash
description:
Go GG It’s ya birthday..

In fact, make that our 2nd Birthday !!!

We cannot believe it’s been 2 whole years since our first ever party and it just keeps growing !

Firstly, we want to say how thankful we are to all you cuties who have been with us from the start, the gorgeous community we have grown and the amazing memories we have created. We love and appreciate you! 

To celebrate our 2nd birthday we have a smoking hot lineup of UKG’s finest who are ready to serve you a big old slice of your beloved garage tuneskis. Who said you can’t have your cake and eat it?!? 

Introducing our stacked birthday lineup, we will be joined by LA’s hottest UKG producer and all round bad girl DJ, Introspekt and London’s rave fave, Angel D’lite! Its safe to say we’re in great company.

Of course you will also have your Garage Girls on b2b duties steering this party ship into destination euphoria! 

_________________________________________________________

Remember tickets are only available on the door so get down early to dance with us!

Our event is an inclusive event. We want everybody to feel safe, respected and comfortable. If at any point in the night you don’t feel safe, please make sure to speak directly to the venue staff or organisers who will be able to support you.

NO racism/discrimination/sexism/homophobia/transphobia-any form of predatory, intimidating or negative behaviour and you’ll be shown the door.

Let’s all enjoy this together. See you in the dance!

Love GG

title: Come, let me show you around
description:
The second chapter of “Come, let me show you around” at kwia is happening on Wednesday, 22nd May. This time, our guests reflect diverse dualities, bringing together their deep-rooted heritage and the musical influences they’ve embraced along their journeys.

Date: Wednesday, May 22nd
Time: 20:30 - late

Nico Adomako is a Berlin and Accra-based trans-disciplinary artist. As co-founder of Oroko Radio and the Berlin DJ collective Einhundert, Nico has shaped the music and art scenes in Berlin and Accra. He produces events globally, from London to Tokyo. For this event, Nico shares music from Accra, Kingston, and London, reflecting his globally-minded perspective and commitment to his community.

Lawrence Lee, from New York with Korean and Brazilian roots, is based in Berlin where he founded the A7A imprint and LUSH club night. Known for releases on UMAY, Radiant Records, E-Missions, International Chrome, and Mala Junta, Lawrence will explore the meaning of home by sharing music that reflects his Korean and Brazilian heritage.

Ninafterdark is a DJ and co-founder of the collective Slipmode. Known for her genre-jumping sets that blend nostalgic edits and global club sounds, she approaches music with a non-committal attitude towards the dancefloor. At our event, Ninafterdark will share music from her Somali roots and the influences she found in London.

Luwei, the show's creator, will be conducting the event. Luwei will share sounds from Milan, her second home, from a personal perspective.

"Come, Let Me Show You Around" is a radio show dedicated to uncovering and celebrating geographically underrepresented musical landscapes from around the globe. The show is built around the concept of showcasing music that holds special significance to our guests—from the melodies of their hometowns to the sounds that have inspired them wherever they've roamed. As we explore these special musical selections, we open the floor to stories about cultural backgrounds, personal journeys, and how heritage shapes the music we love.

Amazing graphic design by @f3nk33

title: BLUME AUF ASPHALT hosted by Kalte Liebe
description: Join Blume auf Asphalt at the RSO Berlin on Thursday 23rd May. Hosted by Kalte Liebe, the night promises an intense mix of EBM, new wave, punk, and techno vibes. The line-up features the iconic David Vunk aka Im Kellar alongside Atzenpunk, Diggi Daniel, Mara & Vela, Sydney Valette, and more TBA, each bringing their special flair to elevate the RSO to a concert venue rather than a club. Prepare yourself for an unrelenting sonic journey through the darker, edgier sides of electronic music and beyond.

title: Couples Connected
description:
Lustful evening for couples, women & trios only
Hosts: Miss Mira & Nestor
Melodic Techno, Techhouse & Electro by DJs Kenny & Vero

Open Bar - All Inclusive* Drinks 99€ couples / 130€ trios / 25€ women / Students & Social Ticket** 75€ (couple)
Young couples up to 25 years receive a discount of 20€. (The total number of years must not exceed 52)

Ready for a night of passion, adventure and exciting encounters? Hosts of the Evening Miss Mira & Nestor are in the mood for more and are finally opening the doors to an exclusive sex-positive soiree at the weekend for couples, women & trios only, a sensual journey into the world of lust and freedom - without any single men.

And as befits a weekend party, you can look forward to the finest electronic beats.

This exciting event offers a safe and respectful environment in which you can freely live out your innermost desires. Whether you are curious, want to make new friends or are already an experienced swinger - everyone is welcome!

Let yourself be seduced by driving music, an exciting atmosphere, luxurious whirlpool, intimate play areas and an open bar with cool drinks.

Let's create an unforgettable night together to celebrate the joys of pleasure and explore our deepest desires.

*excluding champagne & cocktails

title: Alles Immer Wieder Releasekonzert Post Neo
description:
Post Neo
Post Neo is a Berlin based experimental electronic pop duo by Nicole Luján and Pauline Weh. Through the sound of their voices, synthesizers and drum machines, their style oscillates between techno beats and dreamy melancholic atmospheres. The musicians' different musical backgrounds result in diverse intuitions which complement each other perfectly when producing tracks. In 2022 Post Neo received a residency from Musicboard Berlin at Sternhagen Gut, where they caught the ear of Gudrun Gut who signed them to her label. Their EP "Alles Immer Wieder" was released as a 10” vinyl in April. 

Acid Drones
Acid Drones is a new recording and live project by Thomas Lea Clarke, a musician, sound artist and ex resident DJ of the Art School Club in Glasgow, now based in Berlin. The debut album by Acid Drones, released on Offen Music in September 2023, weaves together elements of ambient, dub, idm and club-focused music.

Reinartzt 
Mexican-born, rave experimentalist Reinartz (he/him) got into DJing at the old Sunday Club parties in 2018 where he developed a sensitivity to the odd sides of rave music. With multiple music releases on various DIY labels and a monthly show on Threads radio where he showcases sonic adventures of the gelatinous kind, he‘s set himself the task of fully immersing the dancer, always blending multiple styles, genres and eras with a penchant for the weird, the fast, the cosmic and the absurd.

DJ Chichi
DJ Chichi, a genre-fluid artist, serves as a Radio Host at Refuge Worldwide, captivating their audience with their versatile and innovative approach to music. As the co-founder of xcuse:u collective, they break down genre barriers and encourage collaboration among artists. In Berlin, DJ Chichi co-hosts Starseeds, a queer-friendly party series known for its inclusive atmosphere. Their seamless navigation through diverse genres and advocacy for more inclusivity and solidarity in the music industry make DJ Chichi a trailblazer, shaping the landscape of inclusive and creative spaces in the nightlife scene.

title: SEVEN SINS ... KITKAT CLUB .... THE SEXIEST PARTY IN BERLIN
description:
Step into the world of Seven Sins at KitKat Club, where the vibe is electric and every night is an adventure to remember. First ignited in 2019 from a passion project among friends, Seven Sins has evolved into a beacon of freedom and creativity in Berlin’s nightlife scene. After a brief hiatus, we celebrated our revival on July 24th, 2021, marking the birthday of our visionary leader, Sil Romero. Now, we proudly host our event every 4th Thursday of the month, starting at 22:00 in the KitKat Club’s captivating basement.

Seven Sins isn't just a party—it's a movement celebrating a sex-positive and consent-focused culture. Our mission is to create an inclusive atmosphere where all are welcome to explore and express their desires freely and safely.

What Awaits Inside:
The Cave: Dive deep into shadowy corners where secrets thrive.
Doctor Area: Indulge in your wildest medical fantasies, from dentists to doctors.
Kinky Area: Right behind the DJ booth, be seen while staying in the heart of the action.
Intimate Spaces: Encircling the dance floor, discover secluded spots for private moments.
Cage: Positioned in the center of the dance floor for those who dare to be the spectacle.
Chillout Bar: A relaxed space to chat and cool down with a drink.
Complimentary Wardrobe: Ticket price includes wardrobe service.
Phone-Free Privacy: Security checks ensure a camera-free experience to maintain your privacy.
Awareness Team: Ensuring a safe, respectful, and consensual environment for all.

Dress Code:
Come dressed in your most fanciful and sensual attire. Think sexy, kinky, and bold! Acceptable wear includes short black skirts, leather pants/shorts for men, kinky outfits and vibrant costumes that stand out. We don’t accept people in cotton clothing, everyday attire, flowery dresses, sandals, and long fabric pants. Sneakers may be acceptable if they work with your outfit. Remember, the night is a canvas—paint your presence in bold colors not just black!

Event Details:
Date & Time: Join us every 4th Thursday of the month at 22:00
Location: It’s essential to use the left gate for entrance, as the party is specifically located there. Please be sure to enter from the correct side, as there will be a different event happening on the right side.

Follow Us: Keep updated with the latest event details and more via our Instagram @sevensinsparty.

Join us at Seven Sins, where each night is a canvas of possibilities and the music never disappoints. This isn't just a party—it's your gateway to an exhilarating world where the norms of day dissolve into the thrill of the night. Don't miss out on the hottest ticket in Berlin. Embrace your inner sinner and let the celebration begin! See you there!

For tickets :

Please go to our Paypal account and add name and email, you will be automatically in the guest list.

title: Ziel & Egyptian Greyhound
description: Ziel and Egyptian Greyhound will be performing a set of balearic & progressive house, soft rave & other club tunes including some of the tracks from the upcoming EP release, as well as previewing new material they are currently working on.
